epi:questionnaire.epi:title: Family History Questionnare
epi:questionnaire.epi:info: Please complete the questionnaire for all family members to indicate if they have/had diabetes. For those family members who have/had diabetes please indicate their approximate age at diagnosis.
Please do not include any adopted family members or step-brothers/sisters/parents.
Please do not include gestational diabetes.
Please try to answer every question.
Your answers will be treated as strictly confidential and will be used only for medical research.

epi:section.epi:title: Introduction
epi:section.epi:info: Please complete the questionnaire for all family members to indicate if they have/had diabetes. For those family members who have/had diabetes please indicate their approximate age at diagnosis.
Please do not include any adopted family members or step-brothers/sisters/parents.
Please try to answer every question.
Your answers will be treated as strictly confidential and will be used only for medical research.

epi:questionGroup.epi:info: How many brothers and sisters do or did you have?

epi:rule.name: IsAnswered
epi:rule.epi:parameter: Please provide an answer. Enter 0 if you don't have any brothers.

epi:rule.name: IsAnswered
epi:rule.epi:parameter: Please provide an answer. Enter 0 if you don't have any sisters.
